alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:18AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tishomingo and Hardin Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pickwick Dam, or near Pickwick Landing State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Pickwick Landing State Park, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Olive Hill, Shiloh, Hamburg, Phillips, Bruton Branch, Hurley, Walkertown, Olivehill, Red Sulphur Springs, Counce, Lowryville, Damon, Southside, Pollards Mill and Pittsburg Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
